participant_1.background:
I drink my coffee and head to work, worried about my brother who is always getting into trouble.
i can draw.
i am twenty two years old.
I've been trying to find ways to relieve my back pain, but nothing seems to work.
I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.

participant_2.background:
I was a teacher before I started my own clothing line.
i live life to its fullest.
I have been struggling with my mental health recently.
i look down on people who didn t.
I'm majoring in business and love to lamp, but the hardest thing I've ever done was trying to explain this to my parents.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing okay, just a bit stressed about my brother.
Oh no, what's going on?
He's always getting into trouble, and I'm worried about him.
I understand that. It can be hard to watch someone you care about make bad decisions.
Yeah, it really is. I don't know what to do.
Well, I'm sure you're doing everything you can. Just keep being there for him, and hopefully he'll eventually make better choices.
Thanks, I hope so too.
No problem! What do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher.
Oh cool! I used to be a teacher, but I started my own clothing line a few years ago.
That's awesome! How did you get into that?
I've always loved fashion, and I knew I wanted to do something creative. So I started designing and selling clothes online.
That's great! I'm glad it's been successful.
Thanks! It's been a lot of work, but it's been worth it.
Yeah, I bet. I've been trying to find ways to relieve my back pain, but nothing seems to work.
Oh no, that's awful. Have you seen a doctor?
Yeah, I have. They said it's just a muscle strain, and that it should go away on its own.
I hope it does! In the meantime, you could try some yoga or stretching. That might help.
Thanks, I'll try that.
No problem
